word:
Chap. 7 - God's Claims on His Stewards.

                  Sydney, N. S. Wales, October, 1896. 

     Sabbath afternoon [October 3] I met with the church at Ashfield. The Lord gave me a message for the people assembled. I presented before them the third chapter of Malachi. I cannot see how the Lord could present his requirements in a clearer and more forcible manner than he has done in this chapter.
